Class Books

  • java.lang.Object
    • Books

  • public class Books
extends java.lang.Object
    The Books class represents books in a library system. It holds the book records relevant in our context.
    Version:
    (2017.11.24)
    Author:
    (LO,KE-HSIN)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Books(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String author, int year, java.lang.String publisher, int availableNumberOfCopies, java.lang.String publicationDate)
      Create a new book record with a given random ID, title, author,year,publisher,available number of copies and publication date.
